gaps_identified: Roofing membrane manufacturer and type (referenced to specs but not on drawings)
Exact routing of underground electrical to dry well
Condition of existing roof decking (unit price needed)
Hazardous materials survey report for lead caps

confidence_adjustments.reason: One-line note 1 states existing J-Box location is unknown/not found, implying field discovery risk.

ai_observations.title: Unknown Electrical Conditions
ai_observations.insight: Sheet E4.0 Note 1 states 'The J-Box where this would occur was not found' regarding the connection between Panel C and Panel B's feeder. This explicitly identifies a blind spot in the existing conditions that the contractor must resolve.

source_reference.text_excerpt: THE J-BOX WHERE THIS WOULD OCCUR WAS NOT FOUND

suggested_actions: Include allowance for circuit tracing and finding J-Box
RFI to engineer for alternative feed method

ai_observations.title: Field Fabricated Roof Curbs
ai_observations.insight: The project requires 'Field Fabricate 24" High Insulated Roof Curb' (Note 6, M0.1). Most estimators assume factory-built curbs. Field fabrication is significantly more labor-intensive and requires coordination between the mechanical installer and the roofer/carpenter.

source_reference.text_excerpt: FIELD FABRICATE 24" HIGH INSULATED ROOF CURB

suggested_actions: Ensure labor hours reflect field fabrication

ai_observations.title: Lead Awareness Requirement
ai_observations.insight: General Note 7 on A1.1 specifically mentions removal of VTRs with lead caps by 'workers who are trained in lead awareness'. This triggers OSHA lead standards and potentially requires a specialized abatement sub.

source_reference.text_excerpt: REMOVED BY WORKERS WHO ARE TRAINED IN LEAD AWARENESS

suggested_actions: Verify if abatement sub is needed

ai_observations.title: Heat Trace in Downspouts
ai_observations.insight: Heat trace is required inside the rain leaders and overflow leaders (M2.2). This requires the Electrical contractor to feed cable into piping installed by Civil/Plumbing before it is buried or sealed. High risk of sequencing error.

source_reference.text_excerpt: PROVIDE AND INSTALL ELECTRIC HEAT TRACE COORDINATE WITH ELECTRICAL

suggested_actions: Coordinate conduit stub-ups with civil trenching

overall_assessment.summary: The initial extraction captured the main equipment but missed significant electrical distribution upgrades (Main Breaker/Panel MECH) and specific labor-intensive details like field-fabricated curbs and lead abatement. The 'unknown' electrical J-Box is a notable risk factor.
